section.p: You collapse a rotting beam, just inside the cabin. The roof falls in, and a cloud of debris fills the water, obscuring you completely. You grab the gems, but it is not long before the magic of the sea centaurs takes you over. You live on for a hundred years, as a sea centaur. Your adventure ends here.

You can, however, start afresh with a new character. First make sure to erase all ticks, codewords, and Adventure Sheet details in all your Fabled Lands books. You can begin at 1 in any of the books of the series.
